homeScreen.bigTitle.name: Gilli Carmon
homeScreen.description.1: I'm an Israeli-based fullstack developer. My passion is
homeScreen.description.2: writing clean, elegant code for unique apps and websites.
aboutScreen.title: About Me
aboutScreen.niceToMeet: Hi, I’m Gilli. Nice to meet you.
aboutScreen.about.text.1: I’m an autodidact full-stack developer, with over two years experience.
aboutScreen.about.text.2: I’ve taught myself React & React Native on the weekends during my army service. I’ve also played with python, Java, and C#, but right now most of my work is with React & NodeJS.
aboutScreen.about.text.3: I’ve also played with python, Java, and C#, but most of my work is with React & NodeJS.
aboutScreen.about.text.4: I LOVE animals (both dog and cat person. why choose, when you can enjoy both worlds?).
aboutScreen.about.text.6: And in my spare time I compete in horseback riding and volunteer.
